document_data.mainbody:
nkards were large and solid compared to most [[cup]]s. They came with a sturdy handle, allowing them to hold large servings of [[ale]], [[beer]], and other drinks.

A '''talltankard''' was an enormous tankard that could hold twice as much as regular tankards, and had a lid on top.
